duties_responsibilities.duty: Hiring, onboarding, training, leading, managing, and developing the Smaland co-workers in the store.
Overseeing the daily operation of Smaland area and the daily restocking of shopping tools throughout the store.
Ensuring greeter is in place at the store entrance to actively guide and answer customers' questions.
Supporting Checkout & Payment area and other Customer Experience areas as needed.
Following procedures and ensuring adherence to all safety processes and standards.
Reviewing schedule and making needed changes accordingly.
Training co-workers and other Customer Experience Leaders on Smaland processes and safety requirements.
Building emotional connections through meaningful and empathetic interactions with customers, setting the example and coaching others on how to do the same.
Partnering with Safety and Security to ensure adherence to policies regarding Smaland, rules as well as ASR guidelines around cash handling.
Ensuring “How To Shop” and Services communication is up to date, In Shape As New (ISAN) and meets Commercial Review Standards.
Leading, attending, and contributing to store meetings and forums as applicable.

education_certification.credential: 3 years of experience in retail. Experience in retail, preferably in the home furnishing sector. Experience planning, driving output, and measuring performance (business). Experience leading and developing people, preferably in a retail environment.
